name: Left = Lose
description:
Description:

Classic arcade game, run, jump, don't die. You can only go forward, backward is prohibited. The gameplay is designed so that the player can only walk in one direction.

Going back? You lose!

Complete all levels, solve puzzles and avoid traps.

Control:

[D] - Go right.
[R] - Restart.
[ESC] - Quit the game.

Features:

Unique gameplay.
Classic arcade game.
Puzzles.
Traps.
Responsive controls.
60 unique levels.

#leftlose
